definition: to fall into water/to sink/overboard/fig. to degenerate/to sink (into depravity)/to go to the dogs
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
lit. to beat a drowning dog (idiom)/fig. to pulverize an (already defeated) enemy/to hit sb when he's down
like a dog who fell in the river and climbs out—shaking all over

sentences.english: Do not wave on a boat, or you will fall into the water.
sentences.chinese: 行舟過渡時不要亂動，小心落水。

sentences.english: Automatically tricking water slides downwards along a filler to a pond, which eliminates the water falling sound and the drift ice phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 自淋水沿填料下滑至水池，消除了落水聲和漂水現象。

sentences.english: If you can't see the bottom, jump in, don't dive.
sentences.chinese: 如果水深不見底，跳進去時腳先落水，不要俯衝下水。

sentences.english: He acted heroically saving the child from drowning.
sentences.chinese: 他見義勇爲地拯救落水兒童。

sentences.english: He made a dive from the bridge to save the drowning child.
sentences.chinese: 他從橋上跳進水裏去搶救落水兒童。

sentences.english: If you go overboard, the probabilities are not in your favor.
sentences.chinese: 如果你落水了，你可不會喜歡你得救的概率。

sentences.english: Knut then walked in circles until he fell into the water.
sentences.chinese: 然後他走路轉圈直到落水。

sentences.english: Even though he felt dizzy, he did rescue the drowning child.
sentences.chinese: 雖然他覺得頭暈目眩，他還是救出了落水兒童。

sentences.english: Press down pop-up to close drainage. lift.
sentences.chinese: 落水頭壓下，排杆關閉，面盆儲水。

sentences.english: He jumped into the river to save that boy from drowning.
sentences.chinese: 他跳下河去救那個落水的小男孩。

sentences.english: The impulse of falling water turns the waterwheel.
sentences.chinese: 落水的衝力使水輪轉動。

sentences.english: By lending a helping hand to the lifeguards , Scott saved two children from drowning.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特協助救生員救起了兩個落水的兒童。

sentences.english: The man in the river desperately tried to reach the side.
sentences.chinese: 那個落水的人拼命想游到河岸邊。

sentences.english: He did not hesitate for a minute to save the drowning child.
sentences.chinese: 他毫不躊躇去救那個落水的小孩。

sentences.english: Every attempt to save the drowning dog was in vain.
sentences.chinese: 搭救那條落水狗的所有努力都失敗了。

sentences.english: John looked piteous , like a drowned mouse.
sentences.chinese: 約翰那模樣好慘，活像一隻落水的老鼠。

definition: to drown oneself by jumping into the river
to get into difficulties/to meet with danger
to fall into the ocean/to crash into the ocean
to salvage/to dredge/to fish out (person or object from the sea)
Shuili township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
